products.name: 5G CPE
products.category: 5G Customer Premises Equipment / Integrated Access Device (IAD)
characteristics: Uses 5G New Radio (5G NR) mobile network access
High-speed, low-latency home integrated access device
Optimized wireless communication performance
Provides larger bandwidth and high-speed Ethernet interfaces
Designed to deliver optimized user experience

specifications.features: high-speed, low-latency, optimized wireless performance, high-speed Ethernet

products.name: Small Cell
characteristics: Built on Open RAN architecture
Improves indoor/outdoor signal coverage and network capacity
Designed to enhance customer experience and application performance

products.name: FTTx Solution
characteristics: Provides fiber access solutions for high-speed fixed networks
Customizable per customer/operator needs to reduce OPEX
Supports a variety of FTTx technologies

products.name: DOCSIS Cable CPE (modem / EMTA / all-in-one Cable Gateway)
characteristics: Complete DOCSIS 3.0 / 3.1 Cable CPE solutions
Includes DOCSIS modem, EMTA and all-in-one Cable Gateway variants
Built-in EasyMesh and cloud analytics
Integrates latest wireless technologies for home/multi-media use
Targets multi-gigabit household and SMB multimedia/high-bandwidth applications

specifications.features: EasyMesh, cloud analytics, latest wireless tech

products.name: xDSL Integrated Access Device (xDSL IAD)
characteristics: xDSL access via telephone line
Integrates Wi‑Fi wireless networking and VoIP
Offers full-series xDSL integrated access devices for operators

products.name: Wi‑Fi CPE
characteristics: Long-term R&D focus on wireless communications
Leader in home broadband Wi‑Fi CPE
Integrates wireless and 10 Gbps Ethernet
Provides multi-gigabit high-speed broadband for multimedia and high-bandwidth applications

products.name: Wi‑Fi Extender (Mesh / EasyMesh)
characteristics: Designed for operator deployments with rich telco collaboration experience
Based on EasyMesh framework
Embeds advanced technologies and smart network management
Provides complete mesh coverage for home environments

specifications.purpose: extend Wi‑Fi coverage, mesh network management

products.name: STB (Android set-top box)
characteristics: Next-generation Android-based set-top box
Provides hardware and software design services for connected home and multiscreen applications
Recent models integrate voice assistant functionality
Supports stereo audio modes and voice recognition

specifications.features: voice assistant integration, stereo audio modes, voice recognition

products.name: Voice Assistant (brandable)
characteristics: Brandable voice assistant for operators and retail partners
Provides intuitive voice-based interaction for home devices
Includes basic voice control and audio call capabilities
Supports advanced customizable IoT interaction designs per customer

specifications.features: voice control, audio call, customizable IoT integrations

products.name: 79GHz R151 Inner-Wheel Blind-Spot Radar
characteristics: Designed for large commercial vehicle driving safety
Detects inner-wheel blind spots and A-pillar blind zones
Provides BSD (Blind Spot Detection) and LCA (Lane Change Assist) warning functions
Certified: passed EU UN R151 research/test certification

specifications.functions: inner-wheel blind spot detection, A-pillar blind zone detection, BSD, LCA

products.name: 77GHz 360-degree All‑Around Detection Warning Radar
characteristics: 360-degree all-around blind-spot warning radar
Supports BSD and FCW (Forward Collision Warning) functions
High-resolution radar to improve driving safety
Passed multiple national regulatory certifications and product reliability tests

products.name: 3‑in‑1 Vehicle Antenna Box
products.category: Vehicle multi-band antenna / GNSS active antenna
characteristics: Combines LTE antennas and active global navigation satellite system (GNSS) antenna
Intended for vehicle multi-band antenna, fleet management, vehicle ICT, tracking and navigation
Robust environmental protection (IP65) and wide operating temperature range

specifications.applications: vehicle multi-band antenna, fleet management, tracking, navigation

products.name: T‑box / 4G & 5G Intelligent Vehicle System (integrated car unit)
products.category: Vehicle telematics unit / T‑box and intelligent vehicle management system
characteristics: Integrates vehicle head unit (car machine) and radar functions (77/79 GHz mmWave) for real-time driving diagnostics
Enables collision prevention, abnormal driving behavior detection and scoring
Supports remote diagnostics and remote firmware/software updates (OTA)
Supports hierarchical/group vehicle management and fleet statistics
Provides proactive safety alerts and alarm data analytics for improving driving safety

specifications.connectivity: 4G LTE and 5G support (smart EV onboard system)
specifications.functions: real-time driving diagnostics, collision prevention, abnormal-driving detection & scoring, OTA updates, fleet management
specifications.software: smart vehicle management software for remote diagnostics and fleet analytics

products.name: Smart Vehicle Management Software
characteristics: Remote diagnostics for in-vehicle units and radar systems
Enables remote updates to repair system anomalies
Provides hierarchical/group fleet management dashboards and vehicle status statistics
Performs alarm/data analysis to improve driving safety

specifications.features: remote diagnostics, OTA updates, group/hierarchical fleet stats, proactive alerting, alarm data analytics
